meaningMnemonic:
Once you've <kanji>solve</kanji>d a <kanji>theory</kanji>, you should be able to give a pretty good <vocabulary>explanation</vocabulary> of it to somebody else. Makes sense, right? 

解説 refers to a detailed and analytical explanation. It's often used when someone, often an expert, provides an in-depth analysis about a topic, like a sports game or news article <vocabulary>commentary</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
